channel.title: 64 bit Windows 7 error
channel.description:
Alright this problem isn't something only I got but also every other 64 bit user and I'm talking 64 bit this has nothing to do with windows 7 I googled I tried everything but i can't find the answer. I did find people who had the same problem as I do though but in the topics I didn't find any answers. However let's get to the problem, everytime I run a 317 client the client just closes after 10 seconds of gameplay.
[b]FIRST OF ALL I HAVE THE RIGHT 64 BIT JAVA SO DON'T TELL ME TO GET THAT AND SECOND OF ALL IT'S NOT THE SERVER AND ALSO NOT THE CLIENT WHEN I RUN IT ON MY OTHER PC IT WORKS FINE (WINDOWS 7 32 BIT) AND IM NOT IN THE MOOD TO REINSTALL MY LAPTOP[/b]

item.title: 64 bit Windows 7 error
item.dc:creator: @MistaBigBoss MistaBigBoss
item.description:
@MistaBigBoss wrote:

Alright this problem isn’t something only I got but also every other 64 bit user and I’m talking 64 bit this has nothing to do with windows 7 I googled I tried everything but i can’t find the answer. I did find people who had the same problem as I do though but in the topics I didn’t find any answers. However let’s get to the problem, everytime I run a 317 client the client just closes after 10 seconds of gameplay.

FIRST OF ALL I HAVE THE RIGHT 64 BIT JAVA SO DON’T TELL ME TO GET THAT
AND SECOND OF ALL IT’S NOT THE SERVER AND ALSO NOT THE CLIENT WHEN I RUN IT ON MY OTHER PC IT WORKS FINE (WINDOWS 7 32 BIT) AND IM NOT IN THE MOOD TO REINSTALL MY LAPTOP
